Part 1 Why Foster Kenyan Independent Media? Part 2 The Accountability Ecosystem in Kenya Today Part 3 Opportunities

How Journalism Can Thrive

Insights and Opportunities for Strengthening Kenya’s Media Ecosystem
Read the Report

Right now, deep-rooted challenges inhibit Kenyan journalists from holding their government accountable. This research report details these challenges, and was created for both investors and media actors. Our goal is to inspire new funding streams for innovative, rigorous media outlets in Kenya to thrive.

This report is a product of the Reboot Media program, which strengthens government watchdogs worldwide.
